// src/redux/actions/favoriteActions.js
export const ADD_TO_FAVORITES='ADD_TO_FAVORITES';export const REMOVE_FROM_FAVORITES='REMOVE_FROM_FAVORITES';export const addToFavorites=movie=>({type:ADD_TO_FAVORITES,payload:movie});export const removeFromFavorites=movieId=>({type:REMOVE_FROM_FAVORITES,payload:movieId});
